NK014(pha)001:1: // sgyu 'phrul khro bo'i dbang gi brgyud 'debs ni /
NK014(pha)001:2: ston pa kun bzang rgyal ba rigs lnga dang //
NK014(pha)001:3: rigs gsum d+r+wa ma lnga dang rgyal po dzah ku ku r+aa dza in+d+ra b+h+au ti la //
NK014(pha)001:4: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
NK014(pha)001:5: sing+ha u pa r+aa dza go ma sa //
NK014(pha)001:6: sgeg rdor sangs rgyas gsang ba bi ma la //
NK014(pha)001:7: rma lo rin mchog gtsug gyer rnam gnyis la //
NK014(pha)001:8: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
NK014(pha)001:9: rgyal ba'i yon tan gnubs chen sangs rgyas zhabs //
NK014(pha)001:10: khu lung yab sras nyang chen sher mchog dang //
NK014(pha)001:11: ye shes 'byung gnas zur chen sh+aaka 'byung la //
NK014(pha)001:12: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
NK014(pha)001:13: zur chung ka chen rnam bzhi sgro phug pa //
NK014(pha)001:14: tsags tsha sh+aaka rdor sh+aaka 'byung rdo rje 'od //
NK014(pha)001:15: bsod nams rgyal mtshan chos seng sangs rgyas dpal //
NK014(pha)001:16: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
NK014(pha)001:17: bsod nams mgon po sgrol chen yab sras dang //
NK014(pha)001:18: 'gos lo gzhon nu bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde //
NK014(pha)001:19: rin chen rgyal mtshan mgon po zla ba la //
NK014(pha)001:20: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
NK014(pha)001:21: ngag dbang rdo rje dpal ldan bkra shis dang //
NK014(pha)001:22: legs grub tshe ring rdo rje mi rtog rtsal //
NK014(pha)001:23: pad+ma phrin las 'gyur med rdo rje la //
NK014(pha)001:24: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
NK014(pha)001:25: chos dpal rgya mtsho rin chen rnam par rgyal //
NK014(pha)001:26: o rgyan bstan 'dzin phrin las rnam rgyal zhabs //
NK014(pha)001:27: phrin las chos sgron sangs rgyas kun dga' la //
NK014(pha)001:28: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
NK014(pha)001:29: mdo sngags bstan 'dzin rigs bdag phan bde'i mtshan //
NK014(pha)001:30: smin grol yongs rdzogs gdams pa'i chu bo kun //
NK014(pha)001:31: 'dzin mdzad rtsa brgyud bla ma'i tshogs rnams la //
NK014(pha)001:32: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
NK014(pha)001:33: gzhi rgyud rang bzhin ma bcos gnas lugs ngor //
NK014(pha)001:34: lam rgyud thabs kyis mtshon byas smin cing grol //
NK014(pha)001:35: 'bras rgyud lhun grub rig 'dzin sku lnga yi //
NK014(pha)001:36: go 'phang dka' ba med par myur 'grub shog /
NK014(pha)001:37: ces sgyu 'phrul khro bo'i dbang brgyud lugs gcig la
NK014(pha)001:38: gsol ba 'debs pa 'adi'ang gter chen 'gyur med rdo
